basics.name: Harbor (Haobo) Liu
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer
basics.summary: Seeking MLE / SWE / SDE Intern for Summer 2026 | Ex-MLE Intern at Baidu | Passionate about CV and ML

work.summary: Developed anti-fraud vision systems and graph models across the content-moderation stack.
highlights: Built FFmpeg sampling, MTCNN alignment, CosFace embeddings, and ANN clustering to automate 1.6k+ duplicate-face detections daily.
Fused ASR/OCR fingerprints, behavioral features, and few-shot/self-training models (SMOTE, LOF, stacking, TrAdaBoost) to raise recall from 74% → 92% and precision from 75% → 96%.
Deployed GraphSAGE + Louvain fraud community detection and XGBoost/GBDT/RF scoring on Kubernetes with MLflow tracking and A/B tests.

work.summary: Built anomaly-detection pipelines for photovoltaic inspection.
highlights: Automated OpenCV preprocessing, SAM mask creation, and Faster R-CNN fine-tuning to improve mAP@[0.5:0.95] to 42.4 on 12k images.
Containerized training via Docker and distributed workloads on Hadoop, reducing epoch time by 35%.

work.summary: Scaled datasets and deployed embedded vision pipelines for drone imagery.
highlights: Expanded datasets from 1k → 15k using mosaic augmentation and synthetic occlusion; re-clustered YOLOv8 anchors and tuned NMS/IoU thresholds.
Shipped U-Net + OSTrack solutions on embedded edge boards for real-time target monitoring.

work.summary: Directed perception, tracking, and decision pipelines for autonomous robots.
highlights: Integrated RGB-D, LiDAR, pose estimation, and depth-based yaw using YOLOv5 + Kalman filters on ROS2 with serial I/O.
Designed TD-learning control policies with ε-greedy exploration, random sampling, early pruning, and hash-based deduplication; automated OpenVINO deployments with Shell rollback.
Built Webots simulations for rapid experimentation and dataset generation.

work.position: Research Assistant – Multimodal Sentiment Classification and Generation
work.summary: Explored multimodal sentiment modeling with joint vision-language transformers.
highlights: Combined ResNet-50 visuals and RoBERTa text using Transformer cross-attention, outperforming the MMBT baseline by 8% accuracy.
Fine-tuned Stable Diffusion with LoRA (rank 8) for emotion-conditioned image generation.

work.summary: Delivered embedded perception systems for industrial applications.
highlights: Scaled datasets, re-clustered YOLOv8 anchors, and combined U-Net segmentation with OSTrack tracking.
Deployed optimized pipelines on Linux-based edge devices for real-time inference.

education.institution: New York University, Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences

publications.name: CaSTGCN: Deep Learning Method for Information Cascade Prediction
publications.publisher: IEEE Conference on Automation and Computing (CAC)
publications.summary: Introduced TCN + ST-GCN with dual-branch 1×1 attention, Optuna-based hyperparameter search (400 trials), and training refinements that reduced MSLE by 15% versus baselines.
